name: Tehy ry
goal: Tehy is a trade union for qualiefied health care professonals, social workers and students of those professons in both public and private sector. Tehy campaingns for improvements and development in the fields of Finnish health and social care and influences education and labor force policies, also at EU level. Tehy looks after the interest of its members by negotiating and bargaining the collective agreements.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trade
euInitiatives: ttip and other trade agreements, LLL, education and training of health care professionals, HCA, migration, health care mobility, health and social care policy, economic policy and European semester
